Opening Question

Who should conserve water in our community and why?

Type your answer in the box below. If you would also like to draw a sketch to express your ideas, use the sketch box.

Key Vocabulary

You just identified your stakeholders!

A stakeholder is any person who will be affected by a design solution. In this case, stakeholders are people in your community that you will affect if you create a design solution for water conservation. They have a stake in your design solution.

A design solution can affect many people:

  • people that use the design solution
  • people that want the design solution in their community (even if they don't use it)
  • people that don't want the design solution in their community
  • people that will give money, time, or other resources to create the design solution
